entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 6:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 18 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 14 except minus 18 inland. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries in onshore winds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland.
